enWisdom: One who is unwaveringly loyal deserves to be chosen [as a friend]

Wisdom: مَنْ وَرَدَ مَنَاهِلَ الْوَفَاءِ رَوِيَ مِنْ مَشَارِبِ الصَّفَاءِ
enWisdom: One who enters upon the springs of loyalty is quenched by the drink of purity

Wisdom: مَنْ سَكَنَ الْوَفَاءُ صَدْرَهُ أَمِنَ النَّاسُ غَدْرَهُ
enWisdom: People are safe from the betrayal of one in whose heart resides loyalty
How good is loyalty and how evil is treachery!

Wisdom: مَا أَخْلَقَ مَنْ غَدَرَ أَنْ لَا يُوفَى لَهُ
enWisdom: How appropriate it is for the treacherous one to be dealt with disloyally
How good a characteristic loyalty is!
How good a companion of trustworthiness loyalty is!
How good a companion of truthfulness loyalty is

Wisdom: لَا تَنْفَعُ الصَّنِيعَةُ إِلَّا فِي ذِي وَفَاءٍ وَحَفِيظَةٍ
enWisdom: A good turn does not benefit except with one who possesses loyalty and self-restraint
